title: Friday Night Live: Week 6 scores, updates and uploads
text:
Friday Night Live: Week 6 scores, updates and uploads Roy Lang III , rflang@gannett.com 3:09 p.m. CDT October 8, 2015 Calvary helmets will feature a sticker honoring former quarterback Daniel Fitzwater, who died at the age of 20. (Photo: Submitted photo) 8 CONNECT 4 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
With a heavy slate of games tonight, Friday Night Live opens early again for Week 6. Five area games highlight Thursday before Haughton's journey to Byrd and Woodlawn's trip to North DeSoto highlight Friday play. 
Keep up with all the action this week with Friday Night Live. 
Add pictures, comments and updates from local games you attend. Plus, get scores, prep fantasy football updates and social media posts from others. Use the hashtag #TimesFNL. 
Mobile/tablet users click here: FRIDAY NIGHT LIVE WEEK 6 Live Blog Friday Night Live: 2015 Week 6  ; Read or Share this story: http://www.shreveporttimes.com/story/sports/high-school/football/2015/10/08/friday-night-live-week-6-scores-updates-and-uploads/73601792/ TOP VIDEOS
